Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: LKM Hive to File Direct COMPONENT VERSION: 1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.1.3.0.1 and above DESCRIPTION: This LKM unloads data from Hive into flat files. This is a direct load LKM and must be used without any IKM. Additional information can be found on KM option descriptions.
Please see BigDataConnector Documentation for more details.
Defines whether the target file is to be considered local (= outside of the current Hadoop cluster). Default: true
Defines whether the target file is to be stored as plain text file (TEXTFILE) or compressed (SEQUENCEFILE). Default: TEXTFILE
LKM Hive to File Direct.Delete local output dir
